thread.title: Polaris, others to split $2.37 million in expansion funding
thread.title_full: Polaris, others to split $2.37 million in expansion funding

author: Karlee Weinmann
title: Polaris, others to split $2.37 million in expansion funding
text:
Home / Brief / Polaris, others to split $2.37 million in expansion funding Polaris, others to split $2.37 million in expansion funding By: Karlee Weinmann August 31, 2015 3:23 pm 0 Four Minnesota companies will get a combined $2.37 million from the state to support expansion projects slated to create more than 500 jobs. The funding announced Monday comes from the stateâ€™s Job Creation Fund, managed by the Department of Employment and Economic Development.
